ygData.subject: RE: Neato Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: This was, in fact, a bug, and will be fixed hopefully in the next patch. Brian
ygData.messageBody:
This was, in fact, a bug, and will be fixed hopefully in the next patch.

Brian

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tony Donatelli [mailto:donatea@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 9:03 PM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Neato Stuff
>
>
> From: "Tony Donatelli" <donatea@...>
>
> > My question to you all, is this:
> > Does this sound like a bug? The part of him going
> > Aggro on anyone instead of just the one who was
> > fighting a Najena Inhabitant?
>
> I don't think it's a bug, but it does make it DAMN hard to get to
> the UK and
> have a decent conversation with him. The way Beld did it was he
> met up with
> one of my guild's clerics (Ternada) and after they cleared the necros, the
> cleric put a soothe-type spell (don't remember the cleric
> version's name) on
> the UK and then Beld talked to him. Also, consider bringing along an
> enchanter to mes the necros and/or mindwipe the UK after you kill the
> necros.
>
> I don't feel it should be this hard to get to our quest giver, let alone
> have him attack US. Anyway, /feedback or /petition it, I dunno.
> You CAN talk
> to the UK, but you definitely need some help.
>
> Dravith Vandre'i
> 45 Dark Elven SK
> Fennin Ro
>
> > -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
> -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
>
